posts.post_content:
In the wake of Wizards deciding to change Winter Orb's oracle text, I just want everybody to know that at one point this card read thusly, "As long as Winter Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than one land during their untap steps."  
  
I am rather disappointed that they decided to make this card much worse and take away a fun interaction that people have played around with for years.
posts.html:
In the wake of Wizards deciding to change Winter Orb's oracle text, I just want everybody to know that at one point this card read thusly, "As long as Winter Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than one land during their untap steps."

I am rather disappointed that they decided to make this card much worse and take away a fun interaction that people have played around with for years.

posts.post_content: As I saw this card, I decided to insert it in my 1-CMC creature deck, with creatures like [Scute Mob](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scute Mob) and [Death's Shadow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Death's Shadow). posts.post_content:
The "origin and nature" of this game, is that it is constantly changing and evolving as to avoid becoming stagnant. That's why Revised exists. Shit was broken day one.  
  
The only deck archetype hurt by the change is prison decks. Mana denial is something they have repeatedly stated they don't think is fun and that has been obvious for over a decade. Tuning down but not outright killing a card like this opens up a slew of new ideas in eternal formats.  
  
Get out of the summer of '95 and try something new.
posts.html:
The "origin and nature" of this game, is that it is constantly changing and evolving as to avoid becoming stagnant. That's why Revised exists. Shit was broken day one.

The only deck archetype hurt by the change is prison decks. Mana denial is something they have repeatedly stated they don't think is fun and that has been obvious for over a decade. Tuning down but not outright killing a card like this opens up a slew of new ideas in eternal formats.

Get out of the summer of '95 and try something new.

posts.post_content: I have to agree with Nate\_Prawdzik, elhajjaj, KicktheCAN, Thanato5. To completely change the functionality of Winter Orb for absolutely no justifiable reason after almost two decades of great game play is just disgusting. Whoever is making these ridiculous and awful decisions has absolutely no respect for this game and is truly hated by those who have been playing it since its inception. It is almost as if wizards of the coast is going out of their way to devalue old cards and alienate older players. It is as if they want people who have been playing most of their life to quit. Wizards’ decisions repeatedly go against all logic in favor of things that will cause this to happen. My old play group has continualy shrunk over the years. More and more players give up on this great game as their favored decks are destroyed by pointless errata which have no reflection of the cards original intended purpose. Even in alpha testing this card was intended to be tapped by cards like Icy Ma... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
